title: Chronicles of the Dark Moon T02: The wind of the Dragons
description:
At the center of the empire stood the oracle... And one day, it's voice announced the comming of he who would turn the world upside down. Here is his story and that of his companions, barbarrians and warriors, rabbles and mercenaries... And the Warlord so terrible that the Emperor ordered his death. From fear of the shadows... 

------------------------------------------------------------
Note:

If you never read E-comics before, you should download a program like ComicRack, (you can find that here: http://www.softpedia.com/get/Multimedia/Graphic/Graphic-Viewers/ComicRack.shtml).
Then, you can use ".cbr files and open them with ComicRack.
It's easy to use, and has a great quality!

Hope you enjoy!	
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
For other translated Belgian/French comics, you can check my release thread:             <a href="
https://forum.suprbay.org/showthread.php?tid=112889." rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://forum.suprbay.org/showthread.php?tid=112889.</a>
Here the most recent versions of the torrents will be referenced. You can also indicate which series you rather want to read more of. Just comment on a torrent, rate the torrent or send me a message/PM on suprbay, and you'll be able to read it in about one month!
